characters.name: Rimuru Tempest
characters.description:
__Species:__  Human (past life) → Slime
__Kind:__  Reincarnated, Otherworlder

Rimuru Tempest, formerly known as Satoru Mikami, is the main protagonist of Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken. They are the founder and King of the monster country Tempest, situated in the Great Jura Forest, and the partner and sworn friend of Storm Dragon, [Veldora Tempest](https://anilist.co/character/128034/Veldora-Tempest).

characters.name: Shion
alt_names: Legendary Ogre Goddess At Digging Up Sweet Potatoes
characters.description: "War Lord" Shion is Rimuru’s first servant to be in charge of his care as his personal secretary. She is also the leader of the Yomigaeri and also one of Rimuru's strongest fighters and is coveted by many of the Demon Lords who have met her.

characters.name: Veldora Tempest
alt_names: ヴェルドラ＝テンペスト
characters.description:
__Height:__ 210 cm (human form), 100 m (dragon form)
__Species:__ True Dragon
__Blessing / Divine Protection:__ Storm Dragon's Grace, Demon Lord's Ally
__Disaster Rank:__ Catastrophe

Veldora Tempest is the youngest of the four strongest dragons (True Dragons). He is connected with Rimuru by an agreement and was known to rampage here and there. He was the one to name Rimuru and Rimuru gave him his last name, since they share the same last name, Rimuru could technically be classified as Veldora's adoptive brother.

characters.name: Ranga
characters.description: "Star Lord" Ranga is a Wind Spirit Wolf and a loyal follower of Rimuru. The leader of the Star Wolf Clan, and the son of the previous boss of the Direwolves. He is also one of Rimuru's Twelve Patrons who has been given the title of a "Lord".

characters.name: Milim Nava
alt_names: Greatest Among the Ten Great Demon Lords At Digging Up Sweet Potatoes
characters.description:
__Kind:__ Inhabitant

"Destroyer" Milim Nava is one of the oldest and strongest Demon Lords. She is a Dragonoid. Her nickname, Destroyer, is not just for show. She is a demon lord one should never fight against.

characters.name: Shizu
characters.description:
Shizu was the companion of the previous Hero and a Japanese Summoned One. She is also known as the "Explosive Monarch", an A ranked Adventurer of the Freedom Association's Headquarters, and the formal homeroom teacher of the Freedom Academy's S Class students.

She was also the mentor of several excellent pupils whom became important figures of society.

characters.name: Benimaru
characters.description: Benimaru is one of the third group of subordinate Monsters to be named by Rimuru Tempest. Originally an Ogre, he was uncertain of his servitude and intended for it to be temporary, but after being named, he evolved into a Kijin, immediately becoming Rimuru's most powerful subordinate for a time, and decided to serve him permanently. He lives in the Capital city of the Jura Tempest Federation: Rimuru City. Soon after, and became Commander-in-Chief, giving him direct command over Tempest's military forces. Upon Rimuru's ascension to a True Demon Lord, Benimaru evolved into a Fair Oni and reached the strength of a Disaster-Class Monster.

characters.name: Souei
characters.description:
__Height__: 180 cm (Kijin), 190 cm (Ogre)

Souei is an Ogre that was among the third group of subordinates to be named by Rimuru Tempest. He is Rimuru's faithful shadow and the leader of the Shadow Squad of the Jura Tempest Federation.

characters.name: Shuna
characters.description:
Shuna is one of the third group of subordinate Monsters to be named by Rimuru, evolving her from an Ogre to a Kijin. She was originally the princess of the Ogre tribe and even though she had the talent for using Magic, she was a sheltered girl, but quickly got along with the Goblinas

Shuna is the daughter of the late ogre chieftain and she is also Benimaru's younger sister, which is why she's nicknamed "Oni Princess" by Rimuru. Very skilled and knowledgeable in domestic matters, she essentially becomes Rimuru's chief economic advisor together with Rigurd.

characters.name: Daikenja
characters.description:
Unique Skill Great Sage is one of the first two Unique Skills (the other being Predator) that [Rimuru Tempest](https://anilist.co/character/123962/Rimuru-Tempest) had upon being born into his new world. It had evolved from Unique Skill Sage during his death, as he thought since he was approaching his forties as a virgin, he must be something much greater than a mere wizard. 

~!During Rimuru's evolution into Demon Lord this Unique Skill evolved into the Ultimate Skill: Wisdom King Raphael.!~

~!Rimuru gave her a name and she evolved into a manas with the name Ciel!~

characters.name: Rigurd
characters.description: Formerly the chief of the goblin village Rimuru comes across. He's now the acting prime minister of the Jura Tempest Federation. He evolved into a hobgoblin when Rimuru named him.

characters.name: Rigur
characters.description:
Rigur was named after his late elder brother.

Rigur, after making Gobuta the garrison squad leader, has been supporting his father Rigurdo.

characters.name: Gobta
characters.description: Gobta is a hobgoblin and is one of Rimuru Tempest's followers. Though he seems to be air-headed he tends to be a hard-worker and dependable when the time calls for it.

characters.name: Myrd
characters.description:
Myrd is younger brother of Garm and Dord. Though he was a dwarf of few words, he was an expert at what he does. Having knowledge in construction, and well-versed in the arts, he is a one of a kind genius. Myrd was appointed as the captain of the construction team.

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wikia)

characters.name: Kaijin
characters.description:
Kaijin was a blacksmith of the Dwarven Kingdom, and the brother of Kaidou. After he was exiled from his own country, he became Rimuru Tempest's subordinate, and helped build the Monster City "Tempest", he acted as a builder, blacksmith, and craftsmen. He also was the former commander of the Dwargon Engineering Corps.

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wikia)

characters.name: Gido
characters.description:
Gido is a member of Cabal's Party who serves as the 'thief' role. ~!However, he is actually serving as one of the bodyguards of Lady Elyune secretly while under the guise of an adventurer.!~

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wikia)

characters.name: Dord
characters.description:
Dord, the middle brother of Garm and Mild. He is known for his first-­rate craftsmanship. Dord focuses more on dyes and high class attire.

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wikia)

characters.name: Kaval
characters.description:
Kaval is the leader of his adventure's party, where he serves as the 'fighter' role. ~!Alongside Gido, he is also tasked as the secret bodyguard of Lady Elyune under the guise of an adventurer.!~

(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wikia)

characters.name: Ellen
characters.description:
Eren is an adventurer and a member of Kaval's Party. ~!She is actually the daughter of the Duke of Sorcerer's Dynasty Sarion Elalude, who ran off to be an adventurer due to her selfishness and free-spirited personality.!~
 
(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wikia)

characters.name: Garm
characters.description:
Garm, the elder brother of Doldo and Mild. He is a skilled blacksmith. Garm is in charge of everyday clothing and underwear. 
 
(Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wikia)

characters.name: Diablo
characters.description: Diablo is the Black Primordial and a loyal servant of Rimuru Tempest. Before he met Rimuru, he went by the nicknames Black or Noir, the latter which he received from his fellow Primordial kin. After receiving the name Diablo from Rimuru, he evolved to a Demon Peer.

characters.name: Ramiris
characters.description: Ramiris "of the Labyrinth" ["迷宮妖精"のラミリス, "Rabirinsu (Meikyuu Yousei)" no Ramirisu] is a fairy that resides inside of Tempest's Underground Labyrinth. She is also one of the Eight-Star Demon Lords.

characters.name: Gabiru
characters.description: The captain of the Hiryuu of Tempest, and the former lizardmen raid leader. He suffers from a superiority complex. The root of Gabil's pride and confidence​ is the thought that he is the chosen one.

characters.name: Hakurou
characters.description: Hakurou is a Fair Oni and is a loyal follower of Rimuru Tempest. He was one of the survivors of the Orc attack. He was also the teacher of the Dwarven King.

characters.name: Karion
characters.description: ~!Karion is one of the ten demon lords that existed before Rimuru became a demon lord. During the Walpurgis Banquet where Rimuru killed Clayman. Karion became a subordinate of Milim.!~

characters.name: Kurobee
characters.description: Kurobee is a Fair Oni and a loyal follower of Rimuru Tempest. Kurobee was originally one of the Oni that survived the Orc attack. He evolved after being named by Rimuru.

characters.name: Clayman
characters.description: Demon Lord Clayman, is one of the ten demon lords that ~!existed before Rimuru became a demon lord. He turned into Kazaream's underling when Kazaream turned him into a demon lord.!~

characters.name: Vesta
characters.description:
Bester (ベスター Besutā) is a former minister of Dwargon and is currently the lead researcher of Tempest.
~!After joining Tempest he has become more reliable. He got rid of that sharp personality and mellowed out.!~

characters.name: Gazel Dwargo
characters.description:
Species: Dwarf
Blessing / Divine Protection: Divine Protector of Ancestor
Title: King of Armament Nation Dwargon.
The king of Dwargon, Gazel Dwargo, the third generation king of Dwargon, but possesses a similar aura to that of his grandfather in his younger days. He is renowned as a great hero and celebrated as a wise king for his impartial rule.

characters.name: Treyni
characters.description: Treyni is a dryad that resides in the Jura Forest.

characters.name: Souka
characters.description: Gabil's younger sister, and the daughter of Abil. After the Orc Lord incident, she swears her allegeiance to Rimuru. She attends to Souei as a spy.

characters.name: Abil
characters.description:
Relatives:
Gabil (Son)
Souka (Daughter)
Occupations: Lizardmen Chief
He has a bold personality, but with enough humility.
He is a serious person, but he also has many good qualities about him and is a good leader.

characters.name: Alice Rondo
characters.description: One of the children who were incompletely summoned. At 9 years old, Alice is the youngest of the group, and she's also a bit of a tomboy.

characters.name: Garde-Myourmiles
characters.description: An influential merchant from the kingdom of Burumund. Myorumairu is both the chairman of the Burumund shopping district and also a loan shark.

characters.name: Kenya Misaki
characters.description: A member of a group of children who were incompletely summoned. Kenya is the leader of the pack and has a lively disposition.

characters.name: Ryouta Sekiguchi
characters.description: One of the children who were incompletely summoned. Ryota has a shy personality, but he generally gets along well with Kenya.

characters.name: Yuuki Kagurazaka
characters.description:
A former student of Shizu who originally came from Japan and  ~!one of the main antagonists of the series. !~ Yuuki serves as the Guild Master of the Adventurers' Guild in the kingdom of Ingracia, and he loves manga.
 ~!Although Yuuki first comes as a friendly person he is actually a master in manipulating others without hesitation to achieve his goal of a just world that treats everyone fairly. Even though Rimuru and Yuuki get along at first he later addresses Rimuru as a very serious threat to his plans. !~

characters.name: Gale Gibson
characters.description: One of the children who were incompletely summoned. At 11 years old, he is the eldest of the group.

characters.name: Chloe Aubert
characters.description: One of the children who were incompletely summoned. Chloe is a quiet child who loves books.

characters.name: Gelmud
characters.description: A majin that served Demon Lord Clayman of the Ten Great Demon Lords. He wanted to make Orc Lord the new Demon Lord and manipulate him but instead was devoured by it.

characters.name: Tear
characters.description: Member of the Moderate Jesters alongside Laplace and Footman, and as that loyal subordinate of Demon Lord Kazaream.

characters.name: Kaidou
characters.description: He is the captain of the guards of Dwargon, and Kaijin's younger brother.

characters.name: Fuze
characters.description: He is the Brumund Kingdom's Freedom Association, Guild Master.

characters.name: Velyard
characters.description: Baron Velyard is one of Blumund’s ministers. He is a landless baron.

characters.name: Youm Farmenas
alt_names: ヨウム・ファルメナス
characters.description: The Hero-King Farmenas of the Farmenas Kingdom. Formerly the Farmas Kingdom, Count Nidole Maigam’s Territory's, Frontier Garrison Captain Youm.

characters.name: Tamura
characters.description: He is a junior at the same company where Satoru Mikami worked at. The two also went to the same university. He is Miho Sawatari's fiancé.

characters.name: Laplace
characters.description: He is the vice-president of the Moderate Jesters and as that a loyal subordinate of Demon Lord Kazaream.

characters.name: Phobio
characters.description:
__Species:__ Leopard Lycanthrope

He is one of the "Beastketeers" of the Demon Lord Karion. He is proclaimed to be the strongest warrior of the 3 "Beastketeers".

characters.name: Footman
characters.description: Footman is a Majin who is part of the Moderate Harlequin Alliance

characters.name: Orthos
characters.description: Orthos was the true king of the Kingdom of Filtwood. He was a Demon who was thought to be sealed away by a champion named Orthos, but that story was either entirely fabricated, or the demon managed to kill, and later impersonate the champion.

characters.name: Yashichi
characters.description:
__Race:__ Dragonewt

One of [Gabiru](https://anilist.co/character/131041)'s subordinates and friends. Yashichi fervently supports Gabiru through victory and defeat.

characters.name: Kakushin
characters.description:
__Race:__ Dragonewt

One of [Gabiru](https://anilist.co/character/131041)'s subordinates and friends. Yashichi fervently supports Gabiru through victory and defeat.

characters.name: Sukerou
characters.description:
__Race:__ Dragonewt

One of [Gabiru](https://anilist.co/character/131041)'s subordinates and friends. Yashichi fervently supports Gabiru through victory and defeat.

characters.name: Trya
characters.description: Trya is a Dryad that resides in the Jura Forest. She is the sister of Treyni.

characters.name: Frey
characters.description: "Sky Queen" Frey is an ex-Demon Lord and currently a subordinate of Demon Lord Milim Nava. She often scolds Milim for playing around when she is supposed to be working.

characters.name: Leon Cromwell
alt_names: レオン・クロムウェル
characters.description: Leon Cromwell is a former hero and a current Demon Lord of the Eight-pointed Star Octagram. He is the ruler of El Dorado, an island nation located south-west of the world.

characters.name: Miho Sawatari
characters.description: She is Tamura's fiancee.

characters.name: Ifrit
characters.description: Ifrit is a high-ranking spirit; the ruler of flame which was sealed within Shizue Izawa by Demon Lord Leon Cromwell. He used to live in Dwelling of the Spirit before he was stolen by the "Blonde Demon" Leon Cromwell. After that, he was sealed within Shizue Izawa. As a result of this, it gave Shizue an extended lifespan.

characters.name: Haruna
characters.description: She is a resident of the goblin village.

characters.name: Gobzo
characters.description: A Goblin in Tempest thats friends with Gobuta

characters.name: Ririna
characters.description: Ririna is one of the 400 Goblins that migrated to Rimuru's Goblin Village while he was away in Dwargon. After being named by Rimuru, she evolved to a Goblina. She is entrusted by him to manage Tempest's production affair as its supervisor.

characters.name: Touka
characters.description: Souka's subordinate. She forms part of the Shadow Squad, where she mostly gathers information. She used to live in the Lizardmen marshes but moved to Tempest by Abiru's order.

characters.name: Hokusou
characters.description: Souka's subordinate. He forms part of the Shadow Squad, where he mostly gathers information. He used to live in the Lizardmen marshes but moved to Tempest by Abiru's order.

characters.name: Nansou
characters.description: Souka's subordinate. He forms part of the Shadow Squad, where he mostly gathers information. He used to live in the Lizardmen marshes but moved to Tempest by Abiru's order.

characters.name: Saika
characters.description: Souka's subordinate. She forms part of the Shadow Squad, where she mostly gathers information. She used to live in the Lizardmen marshes but moved to Tempest by Abiru's order.
